# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O sdno-optimize-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/sdno/optimize/ct_optimizer/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/ct_optimizer-1.1.0-20161101.120617-1.zip" && unzip -q -o -B sdno-optimize-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip && rm -f sdno-optimize-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip
EXPOSE 8620
RUN echo Open-O sdno-optimize 1.1.0-SNAPSHOT "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/sdno/optimize/ct_optimizer/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/ct_optimizer-1.1.0-20161101.120617-1.zip" > OPENO_VERSION
